explains: n. 纳税人；所收租金只够支付地产税的建筑物

sentences.en: Once again it will be the taxpayer who has to foot the bill.
sentences.cn: 这一次掏腰包的又得是纳税人。

sentences.en: The Government is making the taxpayer pay to fatten up a public sector business for private sale.
sentences.cn: 政府正在让纳税人付钱来养肥一项公共服务事业，再卖给私人。

sentences.en: If yes, taxpayer financing isn't needed.
sentences.cn: 如果是的话，就不需要纳税人的资金了。
